statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null || cd "$HOME"; dir_path=$(pwd); home_dir="$HOME"; if [[ "$dir_path" == "$home_dir" ]]; then display_path="~"; elif [[ "$dir_path" == "$home_dir"/* ]]; then display_path="~/${dir_path#$home_dir/}"; else display_path="$dir_path"; fi; IFS="/" read -ra parts <<< "$display_path"; if [ ${#parts[@]} -gt 3 ] && [[ "$display_path" != "~" ]]; then if [[ "$display_path" == ~* ]]; then display_path="~/.../$(basename "$(dirname "$dir_path")")/$(basename "$dir_path")"; else display_path="/.../$(basename "$(dirname "$dir_path")")/$(basename "$dir_path")"; fi; fi; git_info=""; if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -z "$branch" ]; then branch=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); fi; git_status=$(git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); status_icon=""; if echo "$git_status" | grep -q "^??"; then status_icon="?"; fi; if echo "$git_status" | grep -q "^ M\|^M "; then status_icon="${status_icon}!"; fi; if echo "$git_status" | grep -q "^A \|^M "; then status_icon="${status_icon}+"; fi; if [ -z "$git_status" ]; then status_icon="✓"; fi; if [ ${#branch} -gt 28 ]; then branch="${branch:0:27}."; fi; if [ -n "$status_icon" ]; then git_info=" │  $branch $status_icon"; else git_info=" │  $branch"; fi; fi; time_str=$(date +%H:%M); printf "\033[2m󰷏 %s%s │ 󰦖 %s\033[0m" "$display_path" "$git_info" "$time_str"'
